author: iSazonov
body:
Fix #4712 

RegEx Singleline and Multiline options are not mutually exclusive and can be used at the same time.

Tests for -split operator is added to get real code coverage and exclude regressions.

comments.author: lzybkr
comments.body: I approve of the breaking change, but we'll need an ack from the @PowerShell/powershell-committee before proceeding.

comments.author: SteveL-MSFT
comments.body: @PowerShell/powershell-committee can see how this can be useful and the current documented behavior is an edge case that isn't likely used so accepting this breaking change is approved

comments.author: lzybkr
comments.body: The suggested behavior for negative count should be a different PR.

comments.author: iSazonov
comments.body: @mklement0 Feel free to open Issue for the negative count enhancement.

comments.author: iSazonov
comments.body: @lzybkr Is the PR ready to merge?

title: Enable use 'Singleline,Multiline' option in split operator
